sections.heading: CHANGE OF VENUEArt. 121. Action brought in improper venue; transferWhen an action is brought in a court of improper venue, the court may dismiss the action, or in the interest of justice transfer it to a court of proper venue
sections.text: CHANGE OF VENUEArt. 121. Action brought in improper venue; transferWhen an action is brought in a court of improper venue, the court may dismiss the action, or in the interest of justice transfer it to a court of proper venue.
